desc.filter_element: 如果複選屬性，例如: 火、風，則所有火屬性角色或風屬性角色的條目將會被列入，否則略過。如果沒有選擇任何屬性，將會顯示所有條目。
desc.filter_ex_buff_param: 如果複選條件，則顯示符合任一條件的條目。如果沒有選擇任何參數，將會顯示所有條目。
desc.filter_chained_ex_buff_param: 如果複選條件，則顯示符合任一條件的條目。如果沒有選擇任何參數，將會顯示所有條目。
desc.ex_ability: 同效果在隊伍內不可重複。套用效果範圍皆為全隊，並且不限受益者屬性。
desc.chained_ex_ability: 又稱連鎖 EX。預設套用效果範圍皆為全隊，然而，通常會有目標屬性限制。和 EX 不同的是，CEX 的效果可以重複。

desc.atk: Any parameter that relates to strength
desc.atk_in_game: Also known as base strength. This parameter refers to the displayed STR when you open a character’s info. Includes dragon, wyrmprints, and augments. This parameter is temporary. A function will be added in the future to automatically choose dragons and weapons after you pick the character.
desc.atk_conditional: Any conditional STR buff. Ex: Flurry STR, HP > 70 . . .
desc.atk_buff: During a quest, the STR buff value that is displayed, capped at 200%.
desc.buff_boost: For any skill that scales with buff counts.
desc.buff_count: Amount of buffs applied. Note: Energize and Inspiration, no matter what stage, are considered 1 buff.
desc.buff_zone_self: Number of self-cast buff zones you are in.
desc.buff_zone_ally: Number of ally-cast buff zones you are in.
desc.ex: Co-ability. For elemental damage (Peony), Reduced Str/Def punisher (Gala Leif), CDMG (HMym, VMeldoy) please input directly in their respective fields.
desc.crt: Any parameter that relates to crit.
desc.crt_rate: Crit rate. Note: If inspired is checked, no matter what is inputted here the calculation will assume crit.
desc.crt_damage: Crit damage % increase. The base 1.7x crit damage is already included.
desc.skill: Any parameter that relates to skill damage.
desc.skill_buff: During a quest, the skill damage buff value that is displayed, capped at 200%. Note: Cat Sith’s +180% SD is in this field.
desc.skill_passive: SD% from dragon and wyrmprints. Note: Cat Sith’s passive is a buff and not in this field.
desc.punisher: Any parameter that relates to punisher
desc.punisher_bk: Punisher to enemies in the break state. Note: The def reduction from break state is not in this field.
desc.punisher_others: Other punishers such as affliction punishers (wyrmprint), OD punisher, reduced Str/Def punisher (Gala Leif) are in this field.
desc.other: Other parameters that increase damage such as elemental damage.
desc.other_element_bonus: Other elemental bonus such as Peony’s co-ability and Gala Reborn Poseidon’s passive.
desc.target: Any parameter relating to the target
desc.target_def_down: Def down applied to target. Displayed above the boss’s HP bar during the quest.
desc.target_def: Target’s base def. Usually 10; Kai Yan is 15 (2020/12/20).
desc.target_def_bk: Target’s def reduction during break state. Usual 0.6; Tartarus and LVolk are 0.8 (BSK 1.25)
desc.filter: If any filter is selected, then the parameters that apply will be listed, otherwise they will be skipped.
desc.filter_element: If multiple elements are selected, such as flame and wind, then all flame and wind characters’ skills will be listed, otherwise they will be skipped.
desc.filter_affliction: If multiple afflictions are selected, such as poison and burn, then anything that applies poison or burn will be listed, otherwise they will be skipped. Note: This filters for skills that apply afflictions, not ones that have affliction punishers.
desc.filter_other: 其他篩選條件。如果有勾選限定共享技，則篩選、計算時，只會考慮、顯示共享技能。

entry.cancelable: This skill can be canceled after {{cancelTime}} seconds.
entry.buff_count_desc_capped: +{{each}}% of the total mod for each buff; Capped at {{limit}}%
entry.buff_count_desc_uncapped: +{{each}}% of the total mod for each buff; Uncapped
entry.buff_zone_desc: {{selfBoost}}% mod for each self-built area / {{allyBoost}}% mod for each ally-built area

google_signin.no_uid_details: Cannot find Google user ID. Please try re-login.
google_signin.login_unknown: Failed to login for unknown reason. ({{error}})
google_signin.logout_unknown: Failed to logout for unknown reason.

warning.page_nav: Are you sure to leave this page?
warning.truncated: Due to excessive number of results, results are truncated ({{displayed}} Displayed / {{returned} Available). To display the truncated results, please narrow the search condition.

pages.constructing:
Under construction. Will announce upon completion somewhere.

### Completed before email notification system has been completed

We will announce it in social media (Reddit, FB groups, etc.).

### Completed after the email notification system has been implemented

Users who logged in before or signed up for the email list will receive an email about the new release.
pages.welcome:
Welcome to the DL info website constructed and maintained by the members of the alliance - Oasis of the Maniacs!

Most of the pages and the features are still under construction.

**HDTs/Agitos, Unit Analysis** are completed. Take a look!

Head to the pages/functions which are still under construction to get more details.

manage.add_note: Specify ID to post multi-language version of a post. The web app will check if the combination of the post ID and the language code is available. ID without any related posts is unavailable.
manage.fetch_list_failed: Failed to fetch the post list. ({{error}})

message.alt_lang: This post does not have a version in {{langUi}}. Therefore, we're displaying it in {{langPost}}.
